title: AyaNeo Flip DS Hands On First Look, This New Dual Screen Ryzen Handheld Is Crazy
description:
Unleash the future of handheld gaming with the AYANEO Flip DS!  In this video, we dive deep into the first-ever X86 dual-screen handheld PC powered by the beastly AMD Ryzen 8840U APU.  Experience lightning-fast performance and stunning visuals on its crystal-clear 1080p 120Hz 7" IPS main screen and versatile 3.5" secondary screen.
* Can it¬†handle AAA PC games on the go?
* How does the dual-screen design enhance gameplay?
* Is it portable and comfortable enough for extended gaming sessions?

Back The Indiegogo here: https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/ayaneo-flip-world-1st-dual-screen-windows-handheld--2?utm_medium=cpc&gclid=CjwKCAiA2pyuBhBKEiwApLaIO6rbICJPoj0ppnlX1nid-wT1H1GLACc9A_G-xKBzteyK2TJR149xUBoCBHMQAvD_BwE&utm_source=gog&gad_source=1#/
